commitResults.messageTitle: Level 0: Rename, Greet, Exit
Add Level-1, Echo
commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot only displays welcome message.

Echo method is required within chatbot.

Echo method created which echoes text from users. It exits when string bye, case insensitive is detected.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level-2, (Add, List)
commitResults.messageBody:
Omoh class can only do echo

Functionality of adding tasks and displauing tasks to users is required

Create Class List that stores array of Strings of size 100. Create methods that allow tasks to be stored and retrieved from List

Create Class list so that code becomes neater

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new Class Task
commitResults.messageBody:
Edit Class List such that it now has Class Task added to it.

Functionality of Class Task required such that class variables "String description" and "Boolean isDone" can be stored within the object, telling user what task it is and whether it is completed or not.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add mark task done feature
commitResults.messageBody:
mark i, where i is an integer will cause the task with index i to be marked as done

Add extractTaskNumber method in class Omoh to determine the task number user wants to mark
Add markAsDone, markAsNotDone, printMarkAsDone methods in Class List to change done state of task and also to print out the state of tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unmark task feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Modify method readUserInput in Class Omoh such that it can detect whether user typed in mark or unmark.

Add extractTaskNumber method in Class Omoh such that according to task numer indicated by user, program can decide which task to mark or unmark

Add method modifyDoneState in Class Omoh to mark task in list as done or undone

Add method printMarkTask in Class List to print out which task was marked or unmarked by user

commitResults.messageTitle: Do codingstandards and format code
Add store and print task and deadline feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Use inheritance to create class Deadline
Create condition to look for "deadline" keyword in input and extract the task and deadline
print out task and deadline after it is added

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove echo method from Class omoh
Add todo type of task
commitResults.messageBody:
Readuserinput in Omoh class detects if todo keyword is typed
Add in addTodo function that extracts the description after todo keyword
Add in printTodoMessage function that prints out what was added

commitResults.messageTitle: Add function to add in events
commitResults.messageBody:
Add Class Event that stores description, to and from
Add condition in Class Omoh to detect event keyword in input
Add function in Class List that helps to add event, and print out add event message to CLI

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify printing of all tasks when list is typed
commitResults.messageBody:
getAllTasks function in Class List shows type of Task, as well as doneness of task when "list" keyword is typed by user
Add member String Type in Class Task, Class Event, Class Deadline to store the type of task

commitResults.messageBody:
Modify function getAllTasks() in Class List so that based on type of task, the memebrs will be printed

commitResults.messageTitle: Delete Class List, shift everything to Class Task

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove indentation printing of messages on CLI
commitResults.messageBody: CLI now displays all texts without indentation. Remove indentation such that code is a bit neater

Edit functions in Parent Class Task to ArrayList<Task> tasks
Edit functions in subclass Deadline, Event, Todo to use ArrayList<Task> tasks as well

Edit exception in Omoh.java to catch IndexOutOfBoundsException instead of NullPointerException
